DebugSettings.description: This class is not currently implemented
DebugSettings.title: DebugSettings

first_state.description: The first state to be visited. If None, it will be randomly drawn.
first_state.title: First State

a.description: Coefficient a of the function: value = a * x + b
a.title: A

b.description: Coefficient b of the function: value = a * x + b
b.title: B

enabled.description: Whether the movable spout is enabled
enabled.title: Enabled

operation.description: Operation to perform on the parameter

increment.description: Value to increment the parameter by
increment.title: Increment

decrement.description: Value to decrement the parameter by
decrement.title: Decrement

valve_max_open_time.description: Maximum time (s) the valve can be open continuously
valve_max_open_time.title: Valve Max Open Time

target_total_flow.description: Target total flow (ml/s) of the odor mixture
target_total_flow.title: Target Total Flow

use_channel_3_as_carrier.description: Whether to use channel 3 as carrier
use_channel_3_as_carrier.title: Use Channel 3 As Carrier

target_odor_flow.description: Target odor flow (ml/s) in the odor mixture
target_odor_flow.title: Target Odor Flow

index.description: Index of the odor to be used
index.title: Index

is_operant.description: Will the trial implement operant logic
is_operant.title: Is Operant

stop_duration.description: Duration (s) the animal must stop for to lock its choice
stop_duration.title: Stop Duration

time_to_collect_reward.description: Time(s) the animal has to collect the reward
time_to_collect_reward.title: Time To Collect Reward

grace_distance_threshold.description: Virtual distance (cm) the animal must be within to not abort the current choice
grace_distance_threshold.title: Grace Distance Threshold

amount.description: Determines the amount of reward to be delivered

probability.description: Determines the probability that a reward will be delivered

available.description: Determines the total amount of reward available left in the patch

odor_specification.description: The optional odor specification of the patch

reward_specification.description: The optional reward specification of the patch

rate.description: Rate parameter of the Poisson process that generates the distribution
rate.title: Rate

frequency_filter_cutoff.description: Cutoff frequency (Hz) of the low-pass filter used to filter the velocity signal.
frequency_filter_cutoff.title: Frequency Filter Cutoff

velocity_threshold.description: Threshold (cm/s) of the velocity signal used to detect when the animal is moving.
velocity_threshold.title: Velocity Threshold

a.description: Coefficient a of the function: value = a * pow(b, c * x) + d
a.title: A

b.description: Coefficient b of the function: value = a * pow(b, c * x) + d
b.title: B

c.description: Coefficient c of the function: value = a * pow(b, c * x) + d
c.title: C

d.description: Coefficient d of the function: value = a * pow(b, c * x) + d
d.title: D

operant_logic.description: The optional operant logic of the reward

delay.description: The optional distribution where the delay to reward will be drawn from

value.description: The static value of the distribution
value.title: Value

scale.description: Scaling factor to apply on the sampled distribution
scale.title: Scale

offset.description: Offset factor to apply on the sampled distribution
offset.title: Offset

min.description: Minimum value of the sampled distribution
min.title: Min

max.description: Maximum value of the sampled distribution
max.title: Max

start_position.description: Start position of the virtual site (cm)
start_position.title: Start Position

odor_specification.description: The optional odor specification of the virtual site

reward_specification.description: The optional reward specification of the virtual site

render_specification.description: The optional render specification of the virtual site

inter_site.description: Generator of the inter-site virtual sites

inter_patch.description: Generator of the inter-patch virtual sites

reward_site.description: Generator of the reward-site virtual sites

length_distribution.description: Distribution of the length of the virtual site

id.description: Id of the visual corridor object
id.title: Id
